name: Wing-FTP-Server
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Wing FTP server is a secure multi-protocol file server(FTP, HTTP, FTPS, HTTPS, SFTP) for Windows, Linux, Mac OSX and Solaris.

matches.text: JavaScript is a scripting language that works with your browser to create interactive elements in web pages. The web client depend on JavaScript to function properly.
